sentences.sentence: I see you’ve learned more than I expected... I cannot hide from the truth any longer.
Yes, I was with her that night. The night her husband died. But it was not premeditated, not something I planned.
Her grief, her pain—it overwhelmed us both. In a moment of weakness, we gave in to forbidden desires.
It was wrong. A grave sin, one I will carry to my final judgment.
But I swear, her husband’s death was not of my doing. I had no hand in that tragedy.
If you seek answers, perhaps you should look elsewhere, toward those who dwell in darkness.
Maurice. The dwarf. There is something... unholy about him, something I dare not confront myself.
He revels in vice, in corruption. If anyone here is touched by the devil, it is him.
